imdb.plot outline: Kate Darling had it all. The perfect husband, the perfect house, the perfect life until the untimely death of her husband left her with nothing but a broken heart and a broken wallet. After moving in with her sister, Jessica, Kate desperately tries to move on with her life. However, this proves to be no easy task as the secrets of her late husband begin to surface. After receiving the shock of her life, Kate quickly realizes nothing will ever be the same.
imdb.title: I Just Can't Life Right Now
akas: I Just Can't Life Right Now (United States)
plot: Kate Darling had it all until the untimely death of her husband left her with nothing but a broken heart and a broken wallet. After moving in with her sister, Jessica, Kate desperately tries to move on with her life.::Jane & Jane Entertainment
